absorbing.name: Absorbing
absorbing.description: Hero can use it to negate the damage from 1 critical hit. This destroys the helmet.

armour-penetrating.name: Armour Penetrating
armour-penetrating.description: Deals additional ha damage equal to a target's ha defence.

balancer.name: Balancer
balancer.description: Ignores all undead immunities and resistances.

bashing.name: Bashing
bashing.description: Can be used as an improvised melee weapon to deal 1d4 damage or knock an opponent back.

boost.name: Boost
boost.description: Spend a charge to deal double damage for one round (free action).

breakable.name: Breakable
breakable.description: Can be sacrificed to negate damage from one attack.

break-spell.name: Break spell
break-spell.description: Wielder can sacrifice the spell-breaker to negate one spell targeting them.

chameleon-field.name: Chameleon field
chameleon-field.description: Ring grants [+] to hiding and sneaking.

chitin-weave.name: Chitin weave
chitin-weave.description: All incoming ha damage is reduced [-].

chromatyped.name: Chromatyped
chromatyped.description: Robes are resistant to damage from sources of one of the six sacred colours.

commanding.name: Commanding
commanding.description: [+] to mental domination and charm attacks.

cool.name: Cool
cool.description: The other cool. Resistance to ba damage in the wastelands.

dead-warded.name: Dead-warded
dead-warded.description: Undead are repulsed by the Iksan rationalist runes woven into the lining of the greatcoat. All undead attacks against the wearer suffer [-].

degrading.name: Degrading
degrading.description: Each die that deals maximum damage reduces an enemy's defences by 1 each.

force-field.name: Force field
force-field.description: Incoming high vel-ocity & energy attacks suffer [-].

explosive.name: Explosive
explosive.description: Damages creatures and objects adjacent to the target.

feeding.name: Feeding
feeding.description: The mail feeds on flesh to repair itself. It can also gain mass, granting the wearer 5 temporary life per stone (max +10 life).

fortune-in-misfortune.name: Fortune in misfortune
fortune-in-misfortune.description: When the wearer suffers damage they gain a boon [+] to spend as they will.

fragile.name: Fragile
fragile.description: Physical damage is likely to break the mirror. Comes with a 2 stone protective plastic and foam case.

ghostbreaker.name: Ghostbreaker
ghostbreaker.description: Deals increased damage [+] to incorporeal targets.

ghost-weave.name: Ghost weave
ghost-weave.description: All incoming ka damage is reduced [-].

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and 1 life to commune with the daemon accelerator. The accelerated flail then gains [+] to strike one target.

hindering.name: Hindering
hindering.description: [+] to tests to slow, trip, or otherwise hinder opponents.

jade-essence.name: Jade essence
jade-essence.description: When the wearer would suffer a burden, they can sacrifice the jade modifier to absorb it instead. The gear continues to function, but the modifier is lost.

large.name: Large
large.description: [-] to physical activities in confined spaces.

less-lethal.name: Less lethal
less-lethal.description: Though marketed as non-lethal, this is a lie. Still, victims who make death tests after being whacked by the LVBS roll with [+].

life-charged.name: Life-charged
life-charged.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and 1 life to translate their will through the golem harness into the arrow. The bow deals an additional 1d12 damage on the next attack.

lo-kinetic.name: Lo-kinetic
lo-kinetic.description: Damper field grants resistance against melee and area attack damage.

long-range.name: Long Range
long-range.description: No penalty to hit far away targets, [-] against adjacent.

luminous.name: Luminous
luminous.description: Deals increased damage [+] to creatures of darkness.

mildly-possessed.name: Mildly possessed
mildly-possessed.description: The sword gibbers and talks to itself. Especially when silence would be more helpful.

mobile.name: Mobile
mobile.description: Despite the weight, does not impede movement.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.description: With a bit of judicious hacking, the power dampers can be disabled. The blade flares out, dealing 4d4 damage, but suffering [-] to attacks. In this configuration, the plasma knife burns 3 charges per conflict.

permanent.name: Permanent
permanent.description: The monstrous biomech bonds with the wearer's flesh and bone. Removing it deals 3d10 damage and imposes a burden or permanently reduces a stat by 1.

pointy.name: Pointy
pointy.description: Deals 1d8 damage with a charge attack.

power-curve.name: Power curve
power-curve.description: Heat-ray output is stronger at short range, dealing more damage [+] to adjacent targets.

power-drop.name: Power drop
power-drop.description: Deals double damage to adjacent targets and increased damage [+] to nearby targets.

precise.name: Precise
precise.description: Wielder gains [+] to attacks if they have not been jostled or injured that round.

ranged.name: Ranged
ranged.description: Can attack nearby targets normally and far away targets with [-].

reactive.name: Reactive
reactive.description: Deals 2d6 ha damage to attacker when struck.

reasonably-inspiring.name: Reasonably inspiring
reasonably-inspiring.description: Each turn one ally gains 1d6 to a roll.

recycling.name: Recycling
recycling.description: [+] against the effects of dehydration and starvation.

reflective.name: Reflective
reflective.description: Wearer always takes minimum damage from energy attacks. 1-in-6 chance energy strikes rebound into a random nearby target. Critical hits always ricochet into a random nearby target, with a 1-in-6 chance of hitting the shooter.

sharp-edge.name: Sharp Edge
sharp-edge.description: Used as an improvised melee weapon deals 1d4 damage. Severs extremity on critical hit.

siege.name: Siege
siege.description: Deals double damage to structures and heavily armoured vehicles or very large monsters.

siege-hardpoints.name: Siege hardpoints
siege-hardpoints.description: Wearer can wield large weapons with a single hand. They can wield a siege weapon two-handed.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: If it fires more than once per round, the projector begins to overheat, increasing the chance of a critical failure by 1 each additional time it is fired. The projector cools down in a quarter of an hour or so.

soul-stealer.name: Soul-stealer
soul-stealer.description: Reduces target’s level by 1 each time it hits.

spell-control.name: Spell control
spell-control.description: Grants 2 levels for spell casting and corruption tests.

spell-reflector.name: Spell-reflector
spell-reflector.description: The wearer can spend 1d4 life to roll a ka or ha counterattack as a free action when a wizard casts a spell at them. If they beat the attacker’s roll, the spell is reflected back against its caster.

spirit-boost.name: Spirit-boost
spirit-boost.description: Increases wearer’s aura and charisma by 1 each.

stiletto.name: Stiletto
stiletto.description: Can be used as a knife, dealing 1d4 damage.

sun-forged.name: Sun-forged
sun-forged.description: When the wearer is bathed in UV radiation, all damage suffered is reduced [-].

sword-breaker.name: Sword-breaker
sword-breaker.description: The back of the cutlass is notched. Opponents with bladed weapons suffer an increased critical failure range (weapon breaks on a natural attack roll of 1 or 2).

team-colours.name: Team colours
team-colours.description: [+] to social tests with friendly teams and gangs, [-] with unfriendlies.

tinkling.name: Tinkling
tinkling.description: Clattering plates impose [-] to stealth tests.

toggle-conceal.name: Toggle-Conceal
toggle-conceal.description: At the push of a button, the force-shield disappears, leaving only the projection bracer.

vorpal.name: Vorpal
vorpal.description: Severs an extremity on a critical hit. Decapitates corporeal undead targets.

vorpal-edge.name: Vorpal edge
vorpal-edge.description: On a crit severs slender extremities or inflicts a gushing wound (burden).

zombie-ripper.name: Zombie ripper
zombie-ripper.description: Deals double damage to corporeal undead.
